languages.text: "Интересно, с чего бы это вдруг произошло? Ума не приложу. Вероятно, шерин перестал{mf||а} выгуливать своего ручного ксеноса? Какой печальный — и долгожданный — разлад".
"What could be the cause of it, I wonder? I cannot wrap my mind around it. Has our shereen the Lord Captain stopped walking {mf|his|her} pet xenos? What a sad — and long-awaited — split."
languages.original_text: "Интересно, с чего бы это вдруг произошло? Ума не приложу. Вероятно, шерин перестал{mf||а} выгуливать своего ручного ксеноса? Какой печальный — и долгожданный — разлад".

traits.locale_text: "What could be the cause of it, I wonder? I cannot wrap my mind around it. Has our shereen the Lord Captain stopped walking {mf|his|her} pet xenos? What a sad — and long-awaited — split."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What could be the cause of it, I wonder? I cannot wrap my mind around it. Has our shereen the Lord Captain stopped walking {mf|his|her} pet xenos? What a sad — and long-awaited — split."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What could be the cause of it, I wonder? I cannot wrap my mind around it. Has our shereen the Lord Captain stopped walking {mf|his|her} pet xenos? What a sad — and long-awaited — split."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What could be the cause of it, I wonder? I cannot wrap my mind around it. Has our shereen the Lord Captain stopped walking {mf|his|her} pet xenos? What a sad — and long-awaited — split."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “这到底是怎么回事？我有点弄不明白了。我们亲爱的舰长大人不再带着{mf|他|她}的异形宠物遛弯儿了吗？噢，多么悲伤、多么令人期待已久的——分手。”
languages.original_text: "What could be the cause of it, I wonder? I cannot wrap my mind around it. Has our shereen the Lord Captain stopped walking {mf|his|her} pet xenos? What a sad — and long-awaited — split."

traits.locale_text: “这到底是怎么回事？我有点弄不明白了。我们亲爱的舰长大人不再带着{mf|他|她}的异形宠物遛弯儿了吗？噢，多么悲伤、多么令人期待已久的——分手。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je me demande bien pourquoi. C'est vraiment incompréhensible. Notre shereen aurait-{mf|il|elle} cessé de promener son xénos domestique ? Quelle tristesse... que ce ne soit pas arrivé plus tôt. »
languages.original_text: "What could be the cause of it, I wonder? I cannot wrap my mind around it. Has our shereen the Lord Captain stopped walking {mf|his|her} pet xenos? What a sad — and long-awaited — split."

traits.locale_text: « Je me demande bien pourquoi. C'est vraiment incompréhensible. Notre shereen aurait-{mf|il|elle} cessé de promener son xénos domestique ? Quelle tristesse... que ce ne soit pas arrivé plus tôt. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Me pregunto qué habrá ocurrido. No puedo ni imaginármelo. ¿Acaso nuestro shereen, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, ha dejado de pasear a su mascota xenos? Sería una separación tan triste como esperada».
languages.original_text: "What could be the cause of it, I wonder? I cannot wrap my mind around it. Has our shereen the Lord Captain stopped walking {mf|his|her} pet xenos? What a sad — and long-awaited — split."

traits.locale_text: «Me pregunto qué habrá ocurrido. No puedo ni imaginármelo. ¿Acaso nuestro shereen, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, ha dejado de pasear a su mascota xenos? Sería una separación tan triste como esperada».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「何が原因なんだろう、アタシには理解できない。我らがロード・キャプテンが{mf|彼|彼女}のペットの異種族の散歩をやめたの？なんと悲しい…待ちに待った…別れだっただろうね」
languages.original_text: "What could be the cause of it, I wonder? I cannot wrap my mind around it. Has our shereen the Lord Captain stopped walking {mf|his|her} pet xenos? What a sad — and long-awaited — split."

traits.locale_text: 「何が原因なんだろう、アタシには理解できない。我らがロード・キャプテンが{彼|彼女}のペットの異種族の散歩をやめたの？なんと悲しい…待ちに待った…別れだっただろうね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Woran mag das liegen, frage ich mich? Ich kann es nicht begreifen. Hat unser Shereen der Lord Captain aufgehört, sein Xenos-Haustier Gassi zu führen? Welch traurige — und lang erwartete — Trennung."
languages.original_text: "What could be the cause of it, I wonder? I cannot wrap my mind around it. Has our shereen the Lord Captain stopped walking {mf|his|her} pet xenos? What a sad — and long-awaited — split."

traits.locale_text: "Woran mag das liegen, frage ich mich? Ich kann es nicht begreifen. Hat unser Shereen der Lord Captain aufgehört, sein Xenos-Haustier Gassi zu führen? Welch traurige — und lang erwartete — Trennung."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "What could be the cause of it, I wonder? I cannot wrap my mind around it. Has our shereen the Lord Captain stopped walking {mf|his|her} pet xenos? What a sad — and long-awaited — split."

languages.text: "Neden böyle bir karar alındı acaba? Akıl sır erdiremedim gitti. Şirinim Lord Kaptan, evcil zenosunu artık gezintiye çıkarmıyor mu? Ne kadar acıklı... Beklenen son tabii."
languages.original_text: "What could be the cause of it, I wonder? I cannot wrap my mind around it. Has our shereen the Lord Captain stopped walking {mf|his|her} pet xenos? What a sad — and long-awaited — split."

traits.locale_text: "Acaba sebebi neydi? Akıl sır erdiremedim gitti. Şirinim Lord Kaptan, evcil zenosunu kapı dışarı mı etti? Ne kadar acıklı... Beklediğimiz bir son."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
